It is said that “Education can Change the World”. What according to you are the key contributions of Education in Modern Society?

 

Education has always been a driving force not only in the modern society but from the times immemorial.The main reason for human civilization to progress and develop into a fully civilized society is the ability of  humans  to grasp and learn and use it for the betterment of human race.This special ability of mankind as made us more superior to other animals, and this has made us who we are, not only in terms of growth and progressive but also on how we treat other fellow human beings.

Education has truly changed the world,especially in the last two decades.With tremendous advancement in science and technology there is no area that has not developed because of  the advantages that science and technology offers.Following are some of the contributions of Education.

 

  • Healthcare: The mortality rate of the human population has greatly reduced because of more number of medical collages opening up,because of growing number of doctars,and research in the field of medicine.
  •  Science and Techology:We all know that computers have changed almost all aspects of how we work.Organisations have become lot more faster and effiecent.Employment rates have have gone up.Organisations are able to do quality work in less time.
  • Nations who have not embraced science and technology have lagged behind in every aspect compared to nations have encouraged the growth of science and techology in their country.
Country's who have encouraged their population to educate have gained tremendously in terms of higher income levels,good per capita income and higher standard of living.We can definetly conclude that education has contributed to change the world to a better place for us to live.
